title: Remap Camera Scroll to WASDF
body: Do I have to set it this way in game or what?

replies.body: I'm not sure why you'd want to set it this way even if you could. It conflicts with your abilities and summoner spell positions (W, D, & F). Unless you plan on remapping your keyboard for this, I wouldn't.

It should already be bound to your arrow keys, but you can change them to whatever you like from in-game under "hotkeys".

*Though, I have no idea who moves their map around with the keys*
